then divided for upper body sleeve sts are picked up and knit down the collar is picked up along three edges overlapped and then sewn along the fourth edge body cast on 104 112 120 sts join being careful not to twist sts place marker for the beginning of the round work eight rounds in 2x2 ribbing following chart work in relief pattern until body measures 6 7 ½ 9 from cast on divide for upper body work in pattern across 52 56 60 sts turn work this will be the upper back change to stockinette st and working pattern as established work until upper back measures 4 4 ½ 5 from the dividing row place back sts on holder upper fronts using 52 56 60 sts still on needles work in pattern across 13 15 17 sts and join second ball of yarn bind off center 26 sts continue in pattern across remaining 13 15 17 sts changing to stockinette st and working pattern as established work until fronts measure 4 4 ½ 5 from the dividing row place left front sts on holder three needle bind off/shoulder join return back sts to one needle and with right front and back sts rs decrease work 3 needle bind off using a dpn put needle through the first st on the front needle and then through first st on the back needle k as usual repeat for second st there are now two sts on the right needle lift first st over last st and off the needle one st is now bound off repeat across each shoulder return unworked back sts to holder sleeves preparing to knit in the round begin at underarm seam and pick up and knit 46 50 60 sts around armhole place marker for the beginning of the round work the first and last 3 1 2
